column1: Kit ne ki u eng' ta-u-net
7;Tilil! Tilil! Tilil!;;"Tilil! TiliI! Tilil! Jehovah Kiptaiyat!
Inendet ko TiIiI - mami ne kiroge.
Toror kot Inendet - otei bikab iman;
Mageerei Inendet bik che bo tengekto.
Tilil! Tilil! Tilil! I toror Inyege
8;Tun nyone Jesu ngwony kogeny;;"Tun nyonei Jesu ng'ony kogeny
Si koyom bik tugul eng' ng'ony
9;Jehovah Irimet ne kim;;"Jehovah irimet ne kim
15;Anyiny kot Kainetab Jesu;;"Anyiny kot kainetab Jesu
16;O kot Jehovah ne kilosu;;"O kot Jehovah ne kilosu!
Jesu ne bo tai ak ko bo let
I tia Inye! I tia Inye!
Ak ye ageer boisioniguk che eechen
Ak ye abwat chamyet ne mawalaksei
Tia boiboiyet ye tun kaweek Laitoriat
Ak eng' koigeny kemi tugul koboten
Chalwogindet ne ya ne siirei tugul
Kosichei sobondo ye sik eng' iman.
19;Nda kikanetge kutuswek chebo ngwony;;"Nda kikanetge kutuswek
Nenyi kondit ak imanda. Ine ne iberurech.
kanabech eng' eunnyi; ba-ech ak komutatech.
Mestowot ne mie Inendet ki kechirekyik achek.
Ongilosu achek tugul Inendet ne kisoruech.
Tun kilosu ak malaika ak tugul the kigondo.
21;Jesu Kristo ko yetindet;;"Jesu Kristo ko yetindet
Am u Wering'ung'  Jesu  ne  kigotiachech.
Nyo ak itach yetunet ne o.
24;Mami Kainet ne mie kosiir;;"Mami Kainet ne mie kosiir
25;Ng'o ne ruei eng kaptich;;"Ng'o ne ruei eng kaptich
26;Kimong' Ngo eng Kipsengwet?;;"Kimong` ng'o eng' kipsengwet?
Mi bik che chang' eng' ng'onyuni
30;Abaibai bet ak kemoi;;"Abaibai bet aK Kemoi
33;Mitei tuguk alak che chang';;"Mitei tuguk alak Che Chang'
Mami chi ne siirei J esu
38;Kona chamyet ne o;;"Kona chamyet ne o Jesu Kristo
Teswa chamyet neo si asubun komie
Kona chamyet neo eng' sobenyu tugul
Ye kait Sait ne kaimen emet.
Nganda walaksei tuguk che bo ng'ony
Ma-iima kiy agot ngo mi rirek;
51;Akwong'e amun chamyetab Jesu;;"Akwong'e amu chamnyetab Jesu
Mami ng'alek che m'iach che siirei chu
Mami ng'alek che miach che siirei chu
Kochob oret ne bo nyoetab kaat.
53;Kinyo Jesu eng' chamyenyi;;"Kinyo Jesu eng' chamnyennyi
Mitei ng'alek che chang' eng' Buku-it
Ago ne siirei ko chama Jesu.
Chamnyet ne o ne ki'gochi kome
Si kobiit anyor sobondo ne lee!.
Kole o chamnyet ne chama Jesu
Obwa kegeer Inendet ne mi kaptugut.
Otien tugul ak che mitei kipsengwet."
59;Eng' Noel ne ki bo tai;;"Eng ' Noel ne kibo tai ne kitien malaika
Kiga mong'ji mestowek Che kimitei kewet
Ye kiribei kechirek eng' saitab kemoi.
Kiba anyun mestowek ak koit  Betlehem
Si kogeer  Lakwet  Jesu komi kaptugut.
Kibwa  bik eng' kong'asis Che Ki ng'omen mising'
Ki-indochi kecheiyat kot koit  ye kimi
Kinyo ng`ony Yetindennyo Kogergeit ak  bik
60;Kibiit eng' kemout ne churat;;"Kibiit eng' kemout  ne churat
Che bo boiboiyet  ne o kot
Nyoru chamnyet ak kalyet ne o
64;Kisikyi bergeiyat lakwet kaptugut;;"Kisikyi bergeiyat Lakwet kaptugut
Amu kibet ole kisikyin eng' go.
Ago ma rir Ine ne Yetindennyo.
65;Kinyo kamet ne bananat;;"Kinyo kamet ne bananat
66;Kibwa bik eng' kong'asis;;"Kibwa bik  eng' kongasis
68;O boiboiyet eng' ngwonyuni;;"O boiboiyet eng' ng'onyuni!
73;Kiame eng' ketit;;"Kiame eng' ketit; kiba korotikyuk.
Asorun eng' me-et ak eng' mesundeito.
Ki-a-ibun eng' ga chamnyet ak rirenet
Ki-a-ibun tugul; tos nee ne igona?
74;Kiame eng' ketit;;"Kiame eng' ketit; kiba korotikyuk.
Kiabagach gonnyu  ne mie- oldab bo-unatet -
Asorun eng' me-et ne ng'wan ak eng' mesundeito.
Kiabagach tugul eng gaa; ibagach nee
Ki-a-ibun choto tugul; tos nee ne igona?
76;Mi kotugul nyoetab kaat;;"Mi kotugul nyoetab kaat
82;Ma ko tia kenyisiek;;"Ma ko tia kenyisiek
83;Imuchi konyo Jesu eng' lilindonyi;;"Imuchi konyo Jesu eng' lilind`anyi
Ye ta  ko-imen eng' mesundeitab Karon
Anan ye ka-eech ak kotoi koluu emet
Imuchi Jesu konyo Karon anan bet;
84;Ta konyone Jesu kogeny;;"Ta konyonei Jesu kogeny
Weeksei kogeny ak  Jesu eng` bolik
Logolywek che miach Che bo sobondo.
86;Kiboiboitu mising' ko kaweek Kiptaiyat;;"Kinyo Jesu oldo kinye
87;Ye kingwa Jesu Kipsengwet;;"Ye kingwa Jesu kipsengwet
Kona ameto tuguk  che  bo ng'ony
AK  acham in  kosiir tuguk tugul
Koyom emet tugul ole meng'oti bik.
Itiachi chi tugul ne ratat eng' tengek.
Kitieni kilosu eng' tiendo ne rurei:
O c'hamnyetab Jesu ne nyoIjin bik kogas.
Omwachi bik tugul eng' boiboiyet ne 0:
90;Nam Kainetab Jesu Kristo;;"Nam  Kainetab  Jesu  Kristo
91;Mwawa ng'alek chebo Jesu;;"Mwawa ng`alek Che bo Jesu
93;Jehovah Mestowot ne mie;;"Jehovah Mestowot ne Mie
98;Ribin Jehovah Kot;;"Mat itoptoben eng' kiy tugul;
99;Mi emet ne kararan mising';;"Mi emet ne kararan mising'
100;Mitei emet barak;;"Mitei emet barak ne tilil kot
Ole mi boiboiyet ne bo iman.
Tiendos che kigesor ak kolosu Laitoriat ­
Si tun kemeny tugul ak Kwandanyo
Mi boiboiyet kityo amu mamitei me-et;
103;Ye tun kaait kipsengwet;;"Ye  tun kaait kipsengwet
104;Ye igesgei boisennyu;;"Ye  igesgei boisiennyu ak asiirte eng` oli
Ak ageer emet ne kigochob Jesu
Anai anyun Inendet  ne kisorua eng' me-et
Ak kotorocha eng' chamnyet eng ' olin
Ak alosu  Ine eng' muguleldo komugul
Kuura  bikyuk che kigosib koba kondoena
Tun torocha icheget eng` kipsengwet betuno
Ago Jesu ne amache kot korok."
Ma loo si ageer Jesu kimni
108;Kicham Jehovah bik tugul;;"Kicham  Jehovah  bik tugul
110;Ki lusat ng'onyuni eng' mesundeito;;"Ki lusat ng'onyuni eng' mesundeito
Ago mi lapkeiyet che chamei Jesu -
Si kobiit koboruech Oret ne bo sorunet.
Nyo kochobwech Oret ne bo yetunet.
Si kobiit komutech tugul kebe kipsengwet.
Jesu Ruandet ne mie ne kitonone;
Si kimuch achek kiterter yomsosiek tugul."
Kwong'utiet ne tia! O kot Kainennyi!
Kwong'utiet ne tia! O kot Kai'nennyi!
Kwong'utiet ne tia chamnyet ne uno!
113;Kinyonji Jesu bounindet kemoi;;"Kinyonji Jesu bo-unindet kemoi
Kiwolji Kiptaiyat eng` ng'alek Che ecch:
AK boiboiyet  ne o ne bunu barak
Bik tugul Che lusyotin eng' tengek
AK chi tugul ne somei Yetindet
117;Ng'o ne chobot konyo taitab Jesu?;;"Ng'o ne chobot konyo taitab Jesu
Ne machei konyor sobet ne leel?
Mi ng'o ne ratat eng' chalwogikyik
118;Nee ne iuni simdanyu?;;"Nee ne iuni simdanyu?
128;Mi kurgat tondet Jesu;;"Mi kurgat Toondet Jesu.
Mwawech nguno eng. chamnyet ne o
132;Kaiwe ye mi Jesu si kounin?;;"Kaiwe'ye mi Jesu si kounin?
Ngoyan chi ng`alek Che bo Kiptaiyandet
Ko mengen ngo mi kasar age
134;Kuurin Kiptaiyat inyonji nguno;;"Kuurin Kiptaiyat inyonji nguno.
Amu nee si imwei eng' lapkeiyet
Kuursei Jesu eng' chamnyet ne o.
Kas it nguno; kas it  nguno.
Ngot itebi eng' chalwok kesib kegerei kurget
Si tun koek buch rirek. Choboge!
136;Tos iruchini kit ne u sobondang'ung'?;;"Kuurin Kiptaiyat Jesu eng' kuurset ne o;
Tos ibwat kit  ne te sobondang'ung'?
Tos iruchini kit   ne u sobondang'ung""?
Inai kit ne te eng' Kiptaiyat?
Mamitei keljinet eng' tuguk Che bo ng'ony.
Tos ibwat kit   ne te sobondang'ung'?
Eng' tuguk Che Chang' che mitei ng'ony
Ago mengen kalyet eng' Jesu Yetindet -
Tos ibwat kit ne  te sobondang'ung'?
Nyo kisoobin nguno si isich yetunet  -
Ibwat mising' kit ne te sobondo."
138;Tos a chi ne kim eng' Jesu?;;"Tos
column2: a chi ne kim eng' Jesu?

column1: Mitei luget ne o ne bo iman
142;Ye yomin bunyondet;;"Ye yomin bunyondet ko megochige;
Mobendate ak bik che yaei Tengek
Teech Jehovah kityo eng' chamyet ne o.
Ilumda eng' chamnyeng'ung' ne o kot;
146;Amache anai Jesu kot;;"Amache anai Jesu kot -
147;Kigonyo ng'owony Kiptaiyat;;"Kigonyo ng'ony Kiptaiyat Weritab Jehovah
Ngot kiyan ng'alekyik ak kemete chalwogik
AK kogoitogei Inekobar bik che yaachen.
Kigome komechi bik agot achek tugul
Kima esio komechech agot  nga ki kim kot;
150;Mi tainyon luget;;"Mi  ta-innyo luget ak ko bichii Oret
Ago Jesu Kristo kimnatennyo ne o
Lapkeiyet ne bo ng'ony Ng'olyondennyi ne Kim
Kigonyo Jesu ng`ony eng` chamnyennyi ne o
Ago chobwech nguno oldo eng` kipsengwet
Ongetien eng oret ne iitech  kipsengwet;
Amu Jesu  Kristo  Lapkeiyenyo ne o
Ta kochang bik inne che mitei mesundei
Si koek Kiptaiyat Lapkeiyenywa ne o
Obwa kebe tai amu Ine Kando-indet.
Mwee ine ye kasei Kainetab Jesu.
Kiborie lugoni o eng' kagiiletab ge.
Ongebe tai tugul che kimi oret
159;Tia kalyetab Jesu Kristo;;"Tia kalyetab Jesu Kristo
160;Betut ne o;;"Betut ne o ne kianam
Ma kiy ole katepto oretab ng'ony
Kinyo inendet kosor bik eng' tengek;
King'eet eng' meet eng' betutab somok
Mi Jesu nguno olin bo kipsengwet
Ak ta konyonei komutech kebe ga.
163;Achame ang'alalen ng'alekab kipsengwet;;"Achame ang'alale ng'alekab kipsengwet -
Lilindo ne bo Jesu koboto chamnyennyi.
Achame ng'alechato - ng'alek Che bo iman;
Achame ang'alalji ichek che tom kogas
Amu amei emosto kota kogas kogeny.
165;Nda chechuk tugul;;"Nda chechuk tugul ama mi Jesu
Eng' tuguk che ta kobegu tun?
Nda chechuk tugul ama mi Jesu
Ngot kochama bik che bo ng'onyuni
Ak ko len ichek a chi ne o
Nda chechuk tugul ama mi Jesu
Ma bobibo-en bik tugul che begu
Baibai chi ne magorio eng' Jesu
Ko a magorio eng' ine mising';
Ma'yan ale kimecha Ine eng' Kalvari.
Ak kobwat sobondanyu Jesu eng' Kalvari.
Ak amuchi rani atien tiendab Kalvari."
Kitom agas kuurset ne mie ne bo Mestowondet.
Kicheng'ata eng' ui tugul asubi chalwogik;
Kinyorua eng luset ko a betot inne
AK kiganabwa eng chamnyet anyonji akwennyi.
AK komutwa anyo akwet si koriba mising
Kia u kechiriet ne kima kase it;
Ago nguno ko mabete eng' gotab Kwandanyu."
Choruennyu Jesu eng' iman ne siirei tugul."
176;Abaibai mising eng' Jesu;;"Abaibai mising eng` Jesu -
Amu a sorunot; Amu a sorunot
180;Mamitei Choruet ne u Kiptaiyat;;"Mamitei choruet ne u Kiptaiyat -
Tos mitei chi ne kiroge Jesu?
Anan ngo mi kalyet ne o
182;Ye kibendoti twai;;"Ye  kibendoti t'wai ak Kamukta-indet
Ye kiyani Jesu  ak  kegas it Ine
lyan Jesu ak igas it Ine.
Mi boiboiyet eng` Jesu ye kisub orennyi.
Nganda bichii Oret ak Ko chang' yomsosiek
Biitu  tun kamuung`et  ko kabek betusiek
Nyoru  bik  kalyennyi ak  kagasetab ge
Ma koriachei o-ik bik che bo Jesu;
185;Kiboiboi mising' eng Jesu;;"Kiboiboi mising` eng' Jesu
Tebe tililindo; O chalwok eng' ng'ony.
Sa Jesu eng' ung'ot inye inyege.
Ngot imache kalyet ak ites kayanet
lberurin mising' eng' chamnyennyi ne O
Kot koboi Kiptaiyat sobonwek ak borwek
190;A chobot ayai mageng'ung';;"A chobot ayai mageng'ung'
197;Stoena tuguk chebo ngwony;;"'Stoena tuguk che bo ng'ony
Si ye kimi ak bik alak
Si ye kimi ak bik alak
Ko u ye Ki-igochi bikab keny.
Asi aborji bik Che tom kogas.
207;Konoruet ne mie inne;;"Konoruet ne mie inne
208;Anyiny kot bukuit;;"Anyiny kot Bukuit ne Tilil
209;Kimache konyor bik tugul;;"Kimache konyor bik tugul
212;Ingogas bik tugul;;"I-ngogas bik tugul logoiyweK Che miach!
Mat kogage bik che machei yetunet.
213;Ongeib ng'alekab sorunet;;"Mi kuurset ne bunu komoswek Che chang`
214;Kigekas nga'lek che miach;;"Kigegas ng'alek Che maiach
Che loo en eng' ye mi akwet.

column2: iyokte ng'olyot;;"Mi bik che chang' eng' ng'onyuni

column1: 217;Kicheng'e bik che mitei tengekto;;"Kichenge bik che mitei tengekto
Ak kimutu . . . che lusyotin. Taachei ichek...
Yetindet Jesu; Machei koyet . .. ichek tugul.
Kele mi oret ne bo sobon.
A chobot anyun agas it Jesu
Ak onet bik kosik eng' tengek"
221;Taache Jesu che sigu;;"Taachei Jesu che sigu
(Taachei Jesu che sigu; taachei Jesu che sigu;)
222;Atienye choruet ne chama kot;;"Atinye Choruet ne chama kot
223;Ye kigas igonditab Jesu;;"Ye kigas igonditab Jesu yetun Kanyo kogeny
Ketuitosi eng' kipsengwet ak Ichek che kigondo.
Tun kong'eetos bik Che kigobek eng' Kristo Kiptaiyat
Tun ketebyei eng kipsengwet ak Yetindennyo agoi.
Onge-ot komie Yetindennyyo agoi koweek Ine;
Ye kigesu boisiennyo eng' ng'ony ama komi boisiet
226;Ye kingobou tengekto ng'onyuni;;"Ye kingobo-u tengekto ng'onyuni
Kinyo ng'ony Jesu eng' chamnyet ne o;
Tatun koweeksei eng' betut ne o!
Si ma ywei nyalllda anan me-et.
Asi kogasyin eng' chamnyet ne o.
229;Chamei Jesu lagok tugul;;"Ta  komi  lagok  che  Chang'
Ongemwachi lagok tugul che bo ng'ony.
Chamei Jesu lagok tugul che bo ng'ony.
Ng'o ne Wendi si komwachi logoiywek?
Lagok che tatun koluu eng' kipsengwet.
230;Choruetab logok che mengech;;"Choruetab lagok che mengech
231;Kimi chi keny eng' sirutik;;"Kimi chi keny eng' Sirutik -
232;Ki lagok che mengech;;"Ki lagok che mengech
233;Lasaro ak magoriot;;"Kimi bik aeng eng' betut age-
Ak konyalil kot eng' oldab me-et
Ak konyalil kot eng' oldab me-et
Si yenyo Jesu ko ki chobotin
Baraa oret  ne Wendi oldab m`at;
Baraa oret ne Wendi oldab mat.
235;Kichorgei Jesu konyo Ng'owny;;"Kichorgei Jesu konyo ng'ony
236;Achame agas ng'alek;;"Achame agas ng'alek Che bunu Jehovah
Agobo Jesu Kristo ne kinyo ng'onyuni.
Nguno a bo Yetindet ne kinyo kosorua.
Kinyo Jesu ko-ige lakwet ko u ane
Koborjin lagok tugul atepto ne tilil.
Ak ye asubi iman koberura inne
Ak koriba kochulyo amu chama mising
Atieni kot eng chamnyet ne kona Yetindet;
Alosu mising' Ine agot kotom ageer.
Chamei kogas saenyu kota amite ng'ony
Si atien eng` kipsegwet amu chama mising'"
238;Chame Jesu Kristo bik;;"Chamei Jesu Kristo bik;
Koret ne ya ne mi mat.
239;Machech Jesu Kristo kiluu;;"Machech Jesu kiluu eng' boiboiyet
Ko u tait ne lalei kokweng'sei kemoi
Chi tugul eng' ye mi eng' oldanyi.
Machech Jesu kiluu ko u Ine
Na-ei ye kiluu eng' kakweng'et  ne mie
Chi tugul eng' ye mi eng' oldanyi.
Amu mi mesundei ne o ng'onyuni.
Chi tugul eng' ye mi eng' oldanyi."
241;Nganda chotech bik alak;;"Nganda chotech bik alak
Kim kosiir bunik tugul Kisuboti Jesu.
Eng' tuguk tugul che bo ra
